title.narrative: National and local institutions improve legal and policy frameworks with adequate budget allocation, to promote decent work, social protection, and livelihoods for women, particularly those from priority groups. (SP Output 8)

description.narrative: This outcome combines working strategies with governmental institutions and civil society to improve policy formulation and implementation to ensure women access to social protection and decent work. It includes enhancing coordination mechanisms within the State, women's participation, leadership and knowledge strengthening for advocacy and the implementation of new models of policies or services.
Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - social services (incl youth development and women+ children)

title.narrative: SN_DRF
Women have knowledge and tools to influence and monitor national and local policies, plans and budgets that promote decent work, social protection and gender responsive recovery efforts.
